caption: Fig. 7: Comparative analysis of compress rate and NLL on different datasets. Lower NLL indicates better performance.
description: The chart compares the negative log-likelihood (NLL) of different methods across various compression ratios for MNIST and CelebA datasets.
section: 4.2 Enhancing Efficiency by Morphing the Networks

caption: Fig. 9: Similarity Analysis Between Models. (Top) the CKA comparison between the full model and various other models of different sizes. (Bottom) heatmap of the output KL divergence for each pair of models.
description: The chart displays the CKA values and KL divergence between the full-sized model and models of different sizes, illustrating the feature similarity and knowledge distillation aspects of NeuMeta.

caption: Fig. 9: Similarity Analysis Between Models. (Top) the CKA comparison between the full model and various other models of different sizes. (Bottom) heatmap of the output KL divergence for each pair of models.
description: The chart displays the CKA scores and KL divergence between various sized models trained using individual training, knowledge distillation, and the proposed NeuMeta method, revealing the feature similarity and knowledge transfer properties of each approach.

caption: Fig. 10: Ablation study with or without manifold sampling.
description: The chart displays the effect of manifold sampling on both validation loss and accuracy across various hidden dimensions, showing improved performance with sampling.
